val.html:
const months = Array.from({ length: 12 }, (item, i) => {
  return new Date(0, i).toLocaleString('en-US', { month: 'long' });
});

console.log(months);
// ["January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"]
